subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. coach Jim Fassel, who was credited with recruiting and coaching John Elway at Stanford as an assistant there, was interviewed for the Cardinal’s vacant head-coaching job in Chicago yesterday, according to a person with knowledge of the Stanford search.
